title: Square loop of wire locating in magnetic field

content.question: A square loop of wire carrying a current I is initially in the plane of the page and is located in a uniform magnetic field B that points toward the bottom of the page, as shown above. Which of the following shows the correct initial rotation of the loop due to the force exerted on it by the magnetic field?

choices.label: Choice A shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice A shows the axis to be a vertical line through the center of the square, with the right side of the square going into the page and the left side of the square going out of the page.

Choice B shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice B shows the axis to be a vertical line through the center of the square, with the left side of the square going into the page and the right side of the square going out of the page.

Choice C shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice C shows the axis to be a horizontal line through the center of the square, with the bottom edge of the square going into the page and the top edge of the square going out of the page.

Choice D shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice D shows the axis to be a diagonal line running from the upper left hand corner to the lower right hand corner of the square, with the lower left hand corner of the square going into the page and the upper right hand corner of the square going out of the page.

Choice E shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice E shows the axis to be a diagonal line running from the lower left hand corner to the upper right hand corner of the square, with the upper left hand corner going out of the page and the lower right hand corner going into the page.

content.answer: Choice C shows a square loop of wire with a dashed line indicating an axis around which the loop is rotated and shows the direction of the rotation around the axis. Choice C shows the axis to be a horizontal line through the center of the square, with the bottom edge of the square going into the page and the top edge of the square going out of the page.
